inclusion.criterion: age ≥ 18 years and indication for adjuvant therapy with abciximab
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adjunct to PCI for the prevention of cardiac ischemic complications: In patients undergoing PCI
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: surgery within 2 months, known bleeding disorder, or pregnancy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active internal bleeding, recent (within 6 weeks) gastrointestinal (GI) or genitourinary (GU) bleeding of clinical significance
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has active internal bleeding and recent GI/GU bleeding, making them likely ineligible for the trial.
